author: shawn
msg: Optimized TransformSupport per suggestion by Bob Lee.  (Change should be
entirely transparent; we just pass output to the page directly, when
needed, instead of buffering it unnecessarily.)
I've called the class "SafeWriter" instead of "FlushIgnoredWriter" since
I block both close() and flush().

author: shawn
msg: (And somehow, one of the minor SPEL documentation changes got stuck in this commit too!)

author: shawn
msg: Removed (broken) links to source code.  Not worth coming up with a
general-purpose mechanism to include the source in the 'doc' application.
